pkgmetadata.longdescription: In Silico Quantitative Genetics // Accomplish high performance simulations in quantitative genetics. The molecular genetic components are represented by R6/C++ classes and methods. Mimic the meiosis recombination and de novo genetic variability by means a count-location process (Karlin Liberman, 1978) doi:10.1073/pnas.75.12.6332. The core computational algorithm is implemented using 'Boost' dynamic bitsets (Schaling, 2014) [ISBN:978-1937434366]. A mix between low and high level interfaces provides great flexibility and allows user defined extensions and a wide range of applications.
